title: Topic 006 Question 031
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a virtual network named VNet1. VNet1 contains the subnets shown in the following table.
The subscription contains the virtual machines shown in the following table.
VM3 contains a service that listens for connections on port 8080.
For VM1, you configure just-in-time (JIT) VM access as shown in the following exhibit.
For each of the following statement, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
